attributes.action: Stop the closure of Little Harrowden Post Office, Northamptonshire
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The closure of this branch will cause suffering for the local and particularly the elderly population. The Post Office is part of the heart of the village and closing it could cause its ruin. At a time when government is asking us all to use our cars less this flies in the face of that advice.
